column2: Market Tier Hierarchy: Extreme>>Enthusiast >> Highend >> Upper Mainstream >> Mainstream >> Lower Mainstream >> Upper Budget >> Budget
NOTE: An (?) indicates unknown or rumored specifications.
*Core configuration shown as Pixel Pipelines (PP) or Stream Processors (SP), Texture Mapping Units (TMU), and Raster Operation Processors (ROP).
* Memory type is subject to inaccuracies due to varying configurations and limited available information. What's given should be considered an approximation of what's used.
